question: Will Crin Antonescu win the second most votes in the first round of the Romanian Presidential Election?
description:
The first round of the Romanian presidential election, originally held on November 24, 2024, was annulled by the Constitutional Court. On January 16, Romania's coalition government approved a re-run of the presidential election. It is scheduled for May 4, with a second round on May 18, if no candidate receives an absolute majority of the vote (see: https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romania-confirms-date-tightens-rules-presidential-election-rerun-2025-01-16/).

This market will resolve according to the candidate that receives the second greatest number of votes in the first round of voting. 

If the results of the first round of the Romanian presidential election are not known by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Other."

This market will resolve based on the official results of the election, as reported by a consensus of credible reporting. If there is ambiguity, this market resolves based on the election results from the Romanian Government, specifically the Permanent Electoral Authority (https://www.roaep.ro/prezentare/).

question: LEC: G2 Esports vs. GIANTX
description:
G2 Esports and GIANTX are scheduled to play each other in a regular season matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship League on April 26, 2025, at 9:00 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “G2 Esports” if G2 Esport wins against GIANTX in the best of 3, week 5 matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship league.

This market will resolve to “GIANTX” if GIANTX wins against G2 Esports in the best of 3, week 5 matchup of the League of Legends EMEA Championship league.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond May 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/leagues/lec).

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on April 26?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 25 Apr 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 26 Apr 12:00 ET candle.
This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 25 Apr 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 26 Apr 12:00 ET candle.
If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will the highest temperature in NYC be 68°F or below on April 26?
description:

The resolution source for this market will be information from Wunderground, specifically the highest temperature recorded for all times on this day by the Forecast for the LaGuardia Airport Station once information is finalized, available here: https://www.wunderground.com/history/daily/us/ny/new-york-city/KLGA.

question: Will Pakistan reopen its airspace to India before May?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pakistan officially reopens its airspace to commercial flights by Indian carriers by April 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

A partial reopening will only count if the selection of permitted Indian commercial air carriers constitutes a majority of Indian commercial air traffic.

Reopening must be confirmed by official announcements from India and Pakistan, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will China confirm trade negotiations have begun by next Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the government of the People’s Republic of China publicly confirms that trade negotiations with the United States have begun by May 2, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

Only official announcements will qualify. Unverified or anonymous claims will not qualify.

Statements must clearly indicate that negotiations have begun or are actively ongoing, not merely that China is open to talks, willing to negotiate, or discussing preconditions. 

The resolution source will be official information from the People’s Republic of China.

question: Will Trump say "Million" or "Billion" or "Trillion" 30+ times during his 100 Day Commemorative Rally on April 29?
description:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump says the listed term during his appearance at this event. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the term regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the term will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.
